channel.title: Simple errors
channel.description: okay guys i have two simple errors but i have never dealt with them so i have no idea what to do. i have tried google and youtube but they dont help. heres my errors. This error appears in the client cmd when i try to run it: error_game_js5connect this error is in the run cmd. The system cannot find the path specified.

item.title: Simple errors
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

You’re getting the Client error due to the Server error. The Batch file you’re initiating the Server with cannot find the path specified. This is probably because you haven’t replaced the Java version specified in the file with your own version.

  1. Right click the file you attempt to start your Server with, and click Edit.
  2. Look at the path It’s taking, this is often the “C/:Program Files/” part.
  3. Look at the Java version It’s trying to use - replace this with your own.

Read full topic
